item.title: By: Y

item.description: Wow, kudos to you for attempting the recipe! 1kg of chocolate is very crazy indeed :) Happy to help you out with your tempering issues if you want.

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: Tell me - where did you hide the Aria Pastry Chef?!? Hehe... just kidding! It does look so professional. Great job - too bad you didn't enjoy it as much especially with all the effort you put in!
item.content:encoded: Tell me – where did you hide the Aria Pastry Chef?!? Hehe… just kidding! It does look so professional. Great job – too bad you didn’t enjoy it as much especially with all the effort you put in!

item.title: By: Zita
item.dc:creator: Zita
item.description: OMG... you've tempered a lot of chocolate .... I'm trying to recover my chocoholic here, but I seem to keep coming back for your site... for your amazing chocolate indulgence:)
item.content:encoded: OMG… you’ve tempered a lot of chocolate …. I’m trying to recover my chocoholic here, but I seem to keep coming back for your site… for your amazing chocolate indulgence:)

item.title: By: Forager
item.dc:creator: Forager
item.description: What an excellent looking replica of the Aria dessert! I won't even bother trying this as I'm sure it'd be an absolute disaster for me. Awesome effort!
item.content:encoded: What an excellent looking replica of the Aria dessert! I won’t even bother trying this as I’m sure it’d be an absolute disaster for me. Awesome effort!

item.description: The idea of a tasting plate is wonderful! So many fun options you could do with that.
item.content:encoded: The idea of a tasting plate is wonderful! So many fun options you could do with that.

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: Oh I have this on my to do list. Your efforts look so fantastic! I am totally impressed. Reading over the recipe there are so many elements that need to be altered for the everyday kitchen. I hope you dont have a blast freezer, if you do, I'm so envious!
item.content:encoded: Oh I have this on my to do list. Your efforts look so fantastic! I am totally impressed. Reading over the recipe there are so many elements that need to be altered for the everyday kitchen. I hope you dont have a blast freezer, if you do, I’m so envious!

item.title: By: Belle@OohLook
item.dc:creator: Belle@OohLook
item.description: I thought your DB challenge was fab, and this matches it! It looks amazing, even if you think it's chocolate overload.
item.content:encoded: I thought your DB challenge was fab, and this matches it! It looks amazing, even if you think it’s chocolate overload.

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: Anita, what a magnificent effort. I love how you have been tackling the recipes from MasterChef. Great idea. I have never tried to temper chocolate but did see it happen in Paris in a behind-the-scenes tour of GÃ©rard Mulot. It seemed so very precise that it scared me off. You have done fantastically!
item.content:encoded: Anita, what a magnificent effort. I love how you have been tackling the recipes from MasterChef. Great idea. I have never tried to temper chocolate but did see it happen in Paris in a behind-the-scenes tour of GÃ©rard Mulot. It seemed so very precise that it scared me off. You have done fantastically!
